headline: POLYTEC VIBROMETER CONTROLLER
categories.lvl1: Test & Measurement Equipment > Other Test & Measurement
specstable:
Manufacturer Polytec
Model OFV 3001 SF6
Description Vibrometer Controller
Interface IEEE 488-GPIB
Other Information Velocity decoder: 3DC+ HF4
Displacement decoder: not installed
Remote focus: Installed
Tracking filter: Off, slow, fast
Velocity range: 10mm/s/V, 25mm/s/V, 125mm/s/V, 1000mm/s/V
Velocity filter: off(1.5MHz)5kHz, 20kHz, 100kHz
Operating system: FV 3.2
RS 232/IEEE
Power Requirements 100-240 V 2.5 A 1.3 A(2) 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
CE Marked YES
Year of Manufacture 2001
Exterior Dimensions
Width 17.500 in (44.5 cm)
Depth 14.000 in (35.6 cm)
Height 6.000 in (15.2 cm)
Weight 25 lb (11 kg)
